casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Frank BOWEN. No. 342P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of July 2005 *881by Defendant Bowen for "Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
